thread.title: Debina Bonnerjee wishes Gurmeet in the most romantic manner on his birthday
thread.title_full: Debina Bonnerjee wishes Gurmeet in the most romantic manner on his birthday

author: Urmimala Banerjee
title: Debina Bonnerjee wishes Gurmeet in the most romantic manner on his birthday
text:
Debina Bonnerjee wishes Gurmeet in the most romantic manner on his birthday Debina Bonnerjee and Gurmeet Choudhary are celebrating his birthday in Dubai By Urmimala Banerjee | Published: February 22, 2017 1:21 pm Sonam Kapoor attends Mid-Day Derby event- view pics! 
Just imagine celebrating your birthday on top of the world? Well, Gurmeet Choudhary and Debina Bonnerjee are doing just that. The couple are bringing in Gurmeet’s birthday in what looks like Dubai’s Burj Khalifa. Gurmeet has taken a break of five days to spend some quality time with Debina. The lady wished her husband in the most romantic manner posting a snap from the balcony of their room. We see a shirtless Gurmeet looking hot as hell holding some white rises while Debina leans against the balcony. The lady’s post read: Happy birthday to u my love. Wish for u the sun the moon and the stars. It’s ur bday and u never fail to make me feel #ontopoftheworld always. Awww! (Also Read: Gurmeet Choudhary salutes jawans on the occasion of Republic Day) A post shared by Debina Bonnerjee (@debinabon) on Feb 21, 2017 at 10:23pm PST 
A post shared by Debina Bonnerjee (@debinabon) on Feb 21, 2017 at 4:05am PST 
The actor told Bollywood Life, “I am taking off for a small break with my wife. I cannot disclose the location as it is sort of a secret. The best part is that my look from Laali Ki Shaadi Main Laddoo Deewana will be unveiled tomorrow.” The actor plays the role of Veer in this rom-com set in small-town India. The film also stars Vivaan Shah and Akshara Haasan. Gurmeet’s last film Wajah Tum Ho made news with the steamy scenes between Sana Khan and him. (Also Read: Gurmeet Choudhary rejects two mythological shows after Wajah Tum Ho! No plans of returning to TV?) 
Coming to Gurmeet and Debina, the couple are one of the most romantic ones in TV town. Though they have been married for around five years now, they like to spark alive in their romance. Debina often posts lovey-dovey snaps of the good-looking couple. Last year, they posted a cute video where they were seen dancing on the title track of Ae Dil Hai Mushkil, which went viral. The actor will also be seen in a play in the UK, where he will play Lord Ram while Debina is seen on &TV’s Jai Santoshi Maa.
